data.title: Minnesota Timberwolves Roster
data.meta_description: Minnesota Timberwolves scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Nikola Pekovic was selected as the #1 pick in the Second Round of the 2008 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Nikola Pekovic signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on August 23, 2010.

Ricky Rubio was selected as the #5 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Ricky Rubio signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on May 30, 2011.

Derrick Williams was selected as the #2 pick in the First Round of the 2011 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Derrick Williams signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on December 9, 2011.

Draft Rights to Malcolm Lee, the #13 pick in the Second Round of the 2011 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Chicago Bulls on June 24, 2011. Malcolm Lee signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on December 16, 2011.

Draft Rights to Kevin Love, the #5 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Memphis Grizzlies on June 26, 2008. Kevin Love signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 10, 2008. Kevin Love signed a multi-year extension with the Minnesota Timberwolves on January 25, 2012.

Chase Budinger was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Houston Rockets on June 26, 2012.

Dante Cunningham was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Memphis Grizzlies on July 24, 2012.

J.J. Barea signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on December 16, 2011.

Mickael Gelabale signed a contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on January 19, 2013. Mickael Gelabale re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on January 29, 2013. Mickael Gelabale re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on February 8, 2013.

Chris Johnson signed a contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on January 19, 2013. Chris Johnson re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on January 29, 2013. Chris Johnson re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on February 8, 2013.

Andrei Kirilenko signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 27, 2012.

Luke Ridnour signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 21, 2010.

Brandon Roy signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 31, 2012.

Alexey Shved signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 23, 2012.

Greg Stiemsma signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on August 5, 2012.
